name: Space Defender (Komstuch)
description:
Welcome Brave Space Defender!

Embark on a powerful starship and engage countless enemies in battle to defend your Planet!

Featuring:

  • 5 Dangerous enemy types
  • 4 Powerful Pick-ups
  • Epic Boss Fight
  • Global Leaderboards
  • Infinite waves of ever more powerfull enemies

Controls:

Right Mouse Button /SpaceShootWASD / Arrow KeysFly Starship

Enjoy and leave a comment!
